verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD בְּעָזְּךָ֥ <WH5797> in thy strength יִשְׂמַח־ <WH8055> shall joy מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> The king וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ <WH3444> and in thy salvation מַה־ <WH4100> how יָּ֥גֶיל <WH1523> shall he rejoice מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> how greatly

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <WH8378> desire לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> him his heart's נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> Thou hast given לּ֑וֹ וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH782> the request שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <WH8193> of his lips בַּל־ <WH1077> have not מָנַ֥עְתָּ <WH4513> and hast not withholden סֶּֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ <WH6923> For thou preventest בִּרְכ֣וֹת <WH1293> him with the blessings ט֑וֹב <WH2896> of goodness תָּשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> thou settest לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <WH7218> on his head עֲטֶ֣רֶת <WH5850> a crown פָּֽז׃ <WH6337> of pure gold

חַיִּ֤ים ׀ <WH2416> life שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> He asked מִ֭מְּךָ <WH4480> at נָתַ֣תָּה <WH5414> of thee [and] thou gavest לּ֑וֹ אֹ֥רֶךְ <WH753> [it] him [even] length יָ֝מִ֗ים <WH3117> of days עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> [is] great כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ <WH3519> His glory בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3444> in thy salvation ה֥וֹד <WH1935> honour וְ֝הָדָר <WH1926> and majesty תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה <WH7737> hast thou laid עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <WH7896> For thou hast made בְרָכ֣וֹת <WH1293> him most blessed לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> for ever תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ <WH2302> thou hast made בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה <WH8057> him exceeding glad אֶת־ <WH854> in פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> with thy countenance

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> For the king בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> and through the mercy עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> of the most High בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <WH4131> he shall not be moved

תִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> shall find out יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> Thine hand לְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies יְ֝מִֽינְךָ <WH3225> thy right hand תִּמְצָ֥א <WH4672> shall find out שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8130> those that hate

תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ ׀ <WH7896> Thou shalt make כְּתַנּ֥וּר <WH8574> oven אֵשׁ֮ <WH784> them as a fiery לְעֵ֪ת <WH6256> in the time פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> of thine anger יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> the LORD בְּאַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> in his wrath יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם <WH1104> shall swallow them up וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם <WH398> shall devour אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> and the fire

פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ <WH6529> Their fruit מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> from the earth תְּאַבֵּ֑ד <WH6> shalt thou destroy וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <WH2233> and their seed מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

כִּי־ <WH3588> Though נָט֣וּ <WH5186> For they intended עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> against רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> evil חָֽשְׁב֥וּ <WH2803> against thee they imagined מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה <WH4209> a mischievous device בַּל־ <WH1077> They will not יוּכָֽלוּ׃ <WH3201> [which] they are not able

כִּ֭י <WH3588> for תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <WH7896> Therefore shalt thou make שֶׁ֑כֶם <WH7926> them turn their back בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ <WH4340> [thine arrows] upon thy strings תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן <WH3559> [when] thou shalt make ready עַל־ <WH5921> at פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> against the face

ר֣וּמָה <WH7311> Be thou exalted יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> LORD בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ <WH5797> in thine own strength נָשִׁ֥ירָה <WH7891> [so] will we sing וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָה <WH2167> and praise גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1369> thy power
